fighterB.name: brown field mouse
fighterB.description: a moss-covered stone well sits at the edge of a dense forest clearing. sunlight filters weakly through the canopy, creating dappled shadows on the ground. the air is damp and smells of pine needles and decaying leaves. stone well worn leather boots scattered wildflowers small pile of smooth river stones brown field mouse (fighter) quiet, wary, with a hint of resilience. a feeling of smallness against the vastness of nature. the well appears to be unusually deep and dark. the mouse carries a tiny, polished pebble â€“ a possible talisman or weapon.

battleLog.attackCommentary: Out of NOWHERE, a blur of tiny claws erupts against Godzilla's colossal frame! A surprise uppercut sends the King of Monsters reeling with 175 damage in round one - could.
battleLog.defenseCommentary: The tiny titan, a blur of brown against Godzilla's atomic breath, narrowly WEAVES OUT OF THE ATOMIC DESTRUCTION in a heart-stopping display of reflexes. The crowd ROARS as this unexpected.
